relproducts.title: Nordic Oak Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: Scandinavian interior style is one of the greatest things to come out of the northern countries, and this nordic oak faux wood blind is a fine example of their wonderful good taste. With its light shade, this blind feels fresh, pared back and a sleek way to bring grace and eleg scandinavian interior style is one of the greatest things to come out of the northern countries, and this nordic oak faux wood blind is a fine example of their wonderful good taste.

relproducts.description: Crush nordic mist made to measure vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Nordic Oak & Camel Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: The creamy richness of that soft, neutral wood shade looks so natural it's hard to believe it isn't. Crafted from advanced polymer rather than wood, this stunning and versatile piece combines the look of nature with the reliability of pvc. The addition of complimentary-coloured the creamy richness of that soft, neutral wood shade looks so natural it's hard to believe it isn't.

relproducts.title: Crush Nordic Mist
relproducts.description: Crush nordic mist made to measure roller blind.

relproducts.title: Hygge Birds Nordic Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: So fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after. Taking the pleasure of the small things, the playful birds carry heart shapes and are decorated in sweet tones. The simply stylised leaves and c so fresh and good-natured, the hygge birds nordic blue roller blind is as scandi as the trend that its so beautifully named after.

relproducts.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Nordic Asc Ice
relproducts.description: Nordic asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind nordic asc ice available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Nordic Asc Cookie
relproducts.description: Nordic asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind nordic asc cookie available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Nordic Indigo - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The sweet floral illustrations of the nordic in indigo have a contemporary, scandinavian feel to them, and the royal blue background is wonderfully offset by the ice white of the pattern, making for a homely yet modern roman blind. Choose an unusual colour scheme of blue and white for your kitchen, keeping the main items of flooring, walls, tiling, and units in these two colours. Then add an accent colour, perhaps yellow, lime, or orange, to bring the room to life.

relproducts.title: Nordic Ochre - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In vivid mustard yellow and pure white, the nordic in ochre has a distinctly scandinavian feel to it, highlighted by its clean lines and vibrant imagery. The pretty florals and foliage sit boldly against the background, so there's no chance of this blind fading into the background. Liven up your kitchen by opting for a vibrant yellow colour palette. Add varying shades of yellow, including the occasional orange and lime for contrast, and temper the look with white walls or units.

relproducts.title: Nordic Noir - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In true monochrome style, the nordic noir features a start, jet black and the iciest of whites, both displayed in a contemporary floral pattern featuring both blossoms and foliage. The look is cool, calm, and collected, and will look fantastic in a range of colour schemes. Go bold or go home by adding the noir to a lime, black, and white colour scheme in your home office. Paint a feature wall in zesty lime, and opt for black and white furniture with clean lines and a modern finish, using lime to accent with cushions, throws, and wall art.
